author: wn.com
title: Baako Takes Up The Gauntlet And Warns..."I Bet You, Effah-Dartey Will Run Away!"
text: Kweku Baako has challenged claims by legal practitioner Captain (rtd) Nkrabea Effah Dartey that multiple award-winning investigator Anas Aremeyaw Anas " will regret the day he was born. " Lawyer Effah Dartey threatened to tear Anas Aremeyaw
